title: What happens if copy paste is removed from a laptop? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you mean the copy and paste functions of an operating system like Windows, those functions are integrated into the OS and cannot be removed or disabled easily (although one search response suggests a PowerShell script to clear the clipboard periodically), as far as I know. Most commenters agree this is a terrible idea, anyway. There are registry hacks to disable the clipboard history, if that’s what you are after. If you mean something else, please clarify your question.
What happens is.. It wouldn't come for sale.😎 It's one of the thing ,we use when we do something related to text
